channel.title: Comments on: Today’s link-a-palooza
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Ariel, please don't talk about your sex life in this blog ;)
item.content:encoded: Ariel, please don’t talk about your sex life in this blog ;)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
So now you know what to get for my next birthday...
I think it is “mekutzar”. As I recall “mekutzrar" has less plastic, but maybe someone who didn't use his wepon as a paper weight can clear this issue.
item.content:encoded:
So now you know what to get for my next birthday…

I think it is “mekutzar”. As I recall “mekutzrar” has less plastic, but maybe someone who didn’t use his wepon as a paper weight can clear this issue.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Wow... this _is_ cool. The nitro gas powered RC boat is extremely a guy toy ;)
By the way, is this a "mekutzar" or "mekutzrar"? And don't insult me with laser sights. These are for pussies :)
item.content:encoded:
Wow… this _is_ cool. The nitro gas powered RC boat is extremely a guy toy ;)

By the way, is this a “mekutzar” or “mekutzrar”? And don’t insult me with laser sights. These are for pussies :)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
The RC shark is realy cool so I looked for its price. Anyway, I got to this store which sells many cools things, among them RC boats, RC cars and guns. So I was wondering, since as I recall you never had the short version, would you like one:
http://www.jprtrading.com/shop/product_info.php/cPath/74_77/products_id/443
There is another version w/ a laser sight for an extra $5 ;-)
Check out the Nitro Gas RC boats - there is a special reservoir in the park where people bring their own sail-boats, and I was thinking how fun it will be to rock the water with a 60mph Nitro Gas boat.
item.content:encoded:
The RC shark is realy cool so I looked for its price. Anyway, I got to this store which sells many cools things, among them RC boats, RC cars and guns. So I was wondering, since as I recall you never had the short version, would you like one:

http://www.jprtrading.com/shop/product_info.php/cPath/74_77/products_id/443

There is another version w/ a laser sight for an extra $5 ;-)

Check out the Nitro Gas RC boats – there is a special reservoir in the park where people bring their own sail-boats, and I was thinking how fun it will be to rock the water with a 60mph Nitro Gas boat.
